title: skins
body: I think that more skins for Yasuo {{champion:157}} and Twitch{{champion:29}}  should be made because I feel like some champs with lesser amount of skins should have more and I own most of them and I think think it should have more of a variety and maybe some Halloween based ones or something i think would be cool.

replies.body:
You'll have a better audience here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts

Please tell me you play Mordekaiser with a name like that.
HUE
I used to play a lot of Mordekaiser when he first came out, but then the nerf hammer hit him in the face {{champion:82}} {{item:3022}}  :(

Ah yes, the dreaded brick wall with his 13 HP pots.

Back when FoN was still around.

RIP
